readable.title: 2158267555_db1d94e468
readable.content: A child rides a pony while an older child and adult stand next to her . A girl is riding on a pony with a little girl and a woman standing beside the pony . A woman and young girl stand next to another young girl sitting on a brown pony . The children take turns riding the minerature pony with an adult supervising . Two people are arranged around a horse and its rider .
